full_description:
\n
BUSINESS ANALYST Needed at our office in Somerset, NJ
BUSINESS ANALYST required at our office 265 Davidson Ave, Suite 205, Somerset, NJ 08873: This position requires to Analyze business or operating procedures to devise most efficient methods; Plan, study work problems; Analyze data gathered; Research Market conditions in local, regional and national areas to determine potential sales of a product or service. Gather information on competitors, prices, sales and methods of marketing. Design and develop applications using SAS, C, C++, SQL, VB, Java Script, HTML, Oracle and SQL Server on Windows. Prepare reports. Coordinate between Software Developer and End users.
Qualification
\n
\n
Masters Degree or equivalent and one year experience in job.
\n
Send Resume at Finite States, Inc. 265 Davidson Ave., Suite 205, Somerset, NJ 08873
\n
\n
\n
